Max Jones.recovery: The Anaheim Ducks announced Jones will miss 4-6 months following surgery to repair a torn pectoral muscle.

Jakob Silfverberg.recovery: The Anaheim Ducks placed F Jakob Silfverberg on injured reserve.

Jakob Chychrun.recovery: Chychrun may not return this season, according to Jose M. Romero of The Arizona Republic.

Lawson Crouse.recovery: Crouse broke a bone in his right hand and could miss the rest of the season, according to Arizona Coyotes insider Craig Morgan.

Dmitrij Jaskin.recovery: The Arizona Coyotes placed F Dmitrij Jaskin on injured reserve.

Clayton Keller.recovery: Keller announced he will not return this season.

Bryan Little.recovery: The Arizona Coyotes placed F Bryan Little on Injured Reserve.

Conor Timmins.recovery: Timmins has been placed on the injured reserve with a lower body injury.

Matt Grzelcyk.recovery: The Bruins announced that Grzelyck underwent a shoulder procedure and will miss approximately five months.

Brad Marchand.recovery: The Bruins announced that Marchand underwent successful arthroscopy and labral repair on both hips and will miss approximately six months.

Charlie McAvoy.recovery: The Bruins announced that McAvoy underwent a shoulder procedure and will miss approximately six months.

Jakub Zboril.recovery: The Boston Bruins placed D Jakub Zboril on Injured Reserve.

Drake Caggiula.recovery: Sabres GM Kevyn Adams said Caggiula will undergo season-ending surgery. His recovery time is 6-8 months.

Cody Eakin.recovery: Eakin hasn't played since Apr. 14. A timetable for his return hasn't been announced.

Andrew Oglevie.recovery: The Sabres placed F Andrew Oglevie on Injured Reserve.

Malcolm Subban.recovery: The Sabres announced that Subban is likely out for the season with a upper body injury.

Sean Monahan.recovery: The Flames placed Monahan on injured reserve.

Tyler Parsons.recovery: The Calgary Flames placed G Tyler Parsons on Injured Reserve.

Frederik Andersen.recovery: Hurricanes coach Rod Brind'Amour said there's no update on Andersen's return.

Jordan Martinook.recovery: Martinook is considered out indefinitely after missing the final four games of Carolina's first-round series against Boston.

MacKenzie Entwistle.recovery: Entwistle isn't expected to return this season according to interim coach Derek King

Jujhar Khaira.recovery: The Blackhawks announced that Khaire underwent surgery and will be out 10-12 weeks.

Andrew Cogliano.recovery: Cogliano is out for Wednesday's (Jun. 15) game against Tampa Bay.

Samuel Girard.recovery: Avalanche coach Jared Bednar said Girard will be out for the rest of the playoffs.

Nazem Kadri.recovery: Avalanche coach Jared Bednar said Kadri will out for the series, "if not longer."

Ryan Murray.recovery: Murray is dealing with a fractured hand/wrist and is out indefinitely, according to Mike Chambers of the Denver Post.

Nathan Gerbe.recovery: Gerbe is expected to miss 4-6 months, according to Aaron Portzline of The Athletic.

Boone Jenner.recovery: As of 4/26, Jenner is out for the rest of the 2021-22 season due to a lower-back injury. (CapFriendly).

Joonas Korpisalo.recovery: The Blue Jackets announced that Korpisalo will undergo surgery.

Daniil Tarasov.recovery: Tarasov underwent season-ending surgery, according to Aaron Portzline of The Athletic.

Braden Holtby.recovery: The Dallas Stars placed G Braden Holtby on Injured Reserve.

Vladislav Namestnikov.recovery: Stars coach Rick Bownes said Namestnikov is week-to-week.

Robby Fabbri.recovery: The Red Wings believe Fabbri tore his ACL and he's expected to miss the rest of the season.

Dylan Larkin.recovery: The Red Wings announced that Larkin had surgery and he's expected to be ready for training camp come this fall.

Filip Zadina.recovery: Zadina is slated to miss the rest of the season with appendicitis

Oscar Klefbom.recovery: Klefbom will have shoulder surgery this month, according to Jason Gregor of TSN Radio. Klefbom is not expected to play this season.

Markus Nutivaara.recovery: The Panthers announced that Nutivaara has not played since Oct. 29 and there is no clear timetable for his return.

Drew Doughty.recovery: The Kings announced that Doughty underwent wrist surgery and will miss the rest of the season.

Sean Walker.recovery: The Kings announced D Sean Walker will miss the rest of the season with a torn ACL/MCL.

Jake Allen.recovery: The Canadiens announced that Allen is dealing with a groin injury and will not play again this season.

Justin Barron.recovery: The Canadiens announced that Barron is dealing with a ankle injury and will not play again this season.

Jonathan Drouin.recovery: The Montreal Canadiens placed F Jonathan Drouin on Injured Reserve.

Shea Weber.recovery: GM Marc Bergevin said it's unlikely that D Shea Weber plays next season and is likely to retire.

Jeremy Lauzon.recovery: The Predators announced that Lauzon is week-to-week.

Jonathan Bernier.recovery: The New Jersey Devils announced that G Jonathan Bernier will miss the rest of the season as he recovers from hip surgery.

Mackenzie Blackwood.recovery: The New Jersey Devils placed G Mackenzie Blackwood on Injured Reserve.

Jack Hughes.recovery: The Devils announced that Hughes will miss the rest of the season with MCL sprain on his left knee.

Jonas Siegenthaler.recovery: The Devils announced that Siegenthaler won't return this season.

Miles Wood.recovery: Devils coach Lindy Ruff said Wood has been shut down for the season.

Cal Clutterbuck.recovery: The Islanders announced that Clutterbuck will miss the rest of the season.

Sammy Blais.recovery: The Rangers announced F Sammy Blais will miss the rest of the season with a torn ACL and his expected recovery time is 6-8 months.

Barclay Goodrow.recovery: Goodrow is week-to-week with a lower-body injury, according to Mollie Walker of the New York Post.

Connor Brown.recovery: Brown won't return this season, according to Claire Hanna of TSN.

Matt Murray.recovery: Murray is not skating and is not close to a return to action, according to report from TSN Sports in Ottawa, ON, CAN.

Shane Pinto.recovery: The Senators placed F Shane Pinto on injured reserve.

Patrick Brown.recovery: Brown is not expected to play again this season, according to Charlie O'Connor of The Athletic.

Sean Couturier.recovery: The Flyers announced that Couturier had back surgery and will miss the rest of the season.

Ryan Ellis.recovery: Flyers GM Chuck Fletcher said Ellis will miss the rest of the season.

Rasmus Ristolainen.recovery: The Flyers announced that there is no timetable for Ristolainen to return to action.

Brian Boyle.recovery: The Penguins announced that Boyle underwent surgery and has an expected recovery time of six weeks.

Casey DeSmith.recovery: DeSmith will miss the rest of the playoffs after undergoing core muscle surgery according to NHL.com.

Brian Dumoulin.recovery: Dumoulin suffered a grade-3 MCL tear.

Nikolai Knyzhov.recovery: Sharks coach Bob Boughner said Knyzhov is out for the season.

Kevin Labanc.recovery: Labanc won't return this season, according to Corey Masisak of The Athletic.

Brandon Tanev.recovery: The Kraken announced F Brandon Tanev will miss the rest of the season with an ACL injury.

Jordan Binnington.recovery: Binnington is expected to miss multiple weeks, according to Jeremy Rutherford of The Athletic.

Torey Krug.recovery: Krug is out for Friday's (May 27) game against Colorado.

Mackenzie MacEachern.recovery: The St. Louis Blues placed F Mackenzie MacEachern on long-term injured reserve.

Petr Mrazek.recovery: Maple Leafs coach Sheldon Keefe said Mrazek is out for a minimum of six weeks.

Nils Hoglander.recovery: The Vancouver Canucks announced that Hoglander underwent surgery and there is no timetable for his return.

Tucker Poolman.recovery: The Vancouver Canucks plaed D Tucker Poolman on long-term injureed reserve.

Brandon Sutter.recovery: Canucks GM Jim Benning said Sutter will miss the start of the 2021-22 season.

Laurent Brossoit.recovery: Brossoit is not close to returning, according to Jesse Granger of The Athletic.

Nicolas Hague.recovery: The Vegas Golden Knights placed D Nicolas Hague on injured reserve.

Brett Howden.recovery: The Vegas Golden Knights placed F Brett Howden on injured reserve.

Robin Lehner.recovery: Lehner will undergo shoulder surgery and will miss the remainder of the season

Nolan Patrick.recovery: The Vegas Golden Knights placed F Nolan Patrick on the long-term injured reserve list.

Reilly Smith.recovery: The Vegas Golden Knights placed F Reilly Smith on Injured Reserve.

Carl Hagelin.recovery: The Washington Capitals placed F Carl Hagelin on injured reserve.

Tom Wilson.recovery: The Capitals announced that Wilson underwent surgery for a torn ACL and will miss 6-8 months.

Cole Perfetti.recovery: The Jets placed F Cole Perfetti on injured reserve.

Mark Scheifele.recovery: Scheifele is not expected to play again this season, according to Mitchell Clinton of WinnipegJets.com.
